snippet: The orders are intended to guarantee high-level attention to accusations of wrongdoing and to offer greater protections to victims, officials said.
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel is completing new rules to fight sexual assault in the military, taking steps meant to guarantee high-level attention to accusations of wrongdoing and to offer greater protections to victims.
lead_paragraph: The orders are intended to guarantee high-level attention to accusations of wrongdoing and to offer greater protections to victims, officials said.

headline.main: Pentagon Finishing Rules to Curb Sexual Assaults
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Finishing Rules To Curb Sexual Assaults

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
